DataElement.preferredName: MD Anderson Symptom Inventory - Core Past 24 Hour Severity Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The mean of all responses by an individual to the Severity domain of the MD Anderson Symptom Inventory.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MD Anderson Symptom Inventory - Core Past 24 Hour Severity Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess multiple symptoms experienced by cancer patients and the interference with daily living caused by these symptoms.

Property.preferredName: Past Integer::24 Hour Severity Total Score
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Added severity total score per CCR request by D.Reeves. mc 12/16/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The number that represents the average of all scores collected to assess symptoms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
